description: This file contains C source code implementing functions for managing network bridges and interface members in a multi-network context, including retrieving and setting network member configurations via system events.

methods.name: int ep_get_allMembers(PL2Net net,PMember live_members,int numMembers)
methods.description: Retrieves all active members of a network interface list from system event, parsing the string and updating the members array.

methods.name: int ep_set_allMembers(PL2Net net,PMember members,int numMembers)
methods.description: Sets the complete list of network members in system event for a specific network.

methods.name: int ep_add_active_net(PL2Net net)
methods.description: Placeholder for adding an active network; currently does nothing.

methods.name: int ep_rem_active_net(PL2Net net)
methods.description: Placeholder for removing an active network; currently does nothing.

methods.name: int ep_netIsStarted(int netInst)
methods.description: Checks if a network instance has started by querying system event status.

methods.name: int ep_get_bridge(int l2netinst,PL2Net net)
methods.description: Retrieves bridge configuration (VID and name) for a given network instance from system event.

methods.name: int ep_get_bridge_mode(void)
methods.description: Retrieves current bridge mode setting from system event.

methods.name: int ep_set_bridge(PL2Net net)
methods.description: Sets bridge configuration (VID and name) for a network by updating system event.

methods.name: int ep_set_rawString(char * key,char * value)
methods.description: Stores a raw key-value pair in system event.

methods.name: int ep_get_rawString(char * key,char * value,int valueSize)
methods.description: Retrieves a raw string value for a key from system event.

methods.name: int ep_clear(PL2Net net)
methods.description: Clears bridge configuration and all members for a network in system event.

ctags.name: ep_get_allMembers
ctags.pattern: /^int ep_get_allMembers(PL2Net net, PMember live_members, int numMembers){$/

ctags.name: ep_get_rawString
ctags.pattern: /^int ep_get_rawString(char* key, char* value, int valueSize) {$/

ctags.name: ep_set_allMembers
ctags.pattern: /^int ep_set_allMembers(PL2Net net, PMember members, int numMembers) {$/
